thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Ordered on a Monday before 12 o clock delivered on Tuesday at 1:30. Got a message from courier that morning that delivery would be between 1or 2 o clock. Excellent service and the lady I spoke to on the phone before I ordered was very polite and helpful.
